messages.title: YOU ARE INVITED
messages.content: A chance to discuss how to SAVE THE NHS with UKIP's Professor Angus Dalgleish and Christopher Howe at Northcote Road Library, Battersea.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Discuss ways to save the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Battersea born, faithful defender of a state-run NHS

contactInformation.address: Provided by Christopher Howe on behalf of the UK Independence Party, 8 Meadow Close, Sutton, Surrey, SM1 3LP

endorsements.endorsement: Featured alongside Christopher Howe to discuss how to save the NHS.

images.caption: Stethoscope forming a heart shape around NHS logo

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is focused on a public meeting to discuss saving the NHS.
